foreach 遍历

foreach, fori, forv 同属一个类型，fori, forv为更方便而提供。
只有String, JSONObject, JSONArray三种类型可以使用foreach

foreach 键值遍历

println("array test..")
arr = [1, false, true, 3.14, "changlie"]
foreach i, item : arr {
    println("index:", i, "; item:", item)
}

println("=================")
println("object test:")
obj = {name:"changlie", age:18, addr:"sz", marriage: false}
foreach key, val : obj {
    println(key, "->", val)
}

forindex 索引遍历

println("array test..")
arr = [1, false, true, 3.14, "changlie"]
fori i : arr {
    println("index:", i)
}

println("=================")
println("object test:")
obj = {name:"changlie", age:18, addr:"sz"}
fori key : obj {
    println("key:", key)
}

forvalue 值遍历

println("array test..")
arr = [1, false, true, 3.14, "changlie"]
forv item : arr {
    println("item:", item)
}

println("=================")
println("object test:")
obj = {name:"changlie", age:18, addr:"sz"}
forv val : obj {
    println("value:", val)
}
